name: The Vortex Cluster
description:
(WARNING CONTAINS JUMP SCARES!)

This was made solo in one week for a horror survival game jam on itch.io that sadly never took place. So it has all the usual gamejam shortcomings, but as halloween is approaching, I thought why not publish it here! 

Sci-fi horror. Careful now and happy halloween.

All assets used are free-to-use Unity Asset Store assets and all sounds are free to use sounds from freesound.org
